WHAT IT IS: a quality of life hack for vanilla cave story when playing orgs
HOW TO USE IT: put your orgs in a folder called "mus" in your data folder and simply do <CMUorgname.org instead of <CMU0001
the files in the .zip are hardcoded.
TECHNICAL INFO:
0x4981E8: start of song path in memory
0x4981F1: start of song name
0x498248: start of previous song name
0x48C93C: strings for hardcoded songs (like title music), and silence

0x41BAD0
55 89 E5 57 56 53 81 EC A4 00 00 00 89 8D 64 FF
FF FF 68 7C C3 48 00 FF 75 08 E8 0E 55 06 00 83
C4 0C 6A 02 89 C6 6A 00 50 E8 5E 5F 06 00 89 34
24 E8 FB 9C 06 00 83 C4 0C 6A 00 89 C7 6A 00 56
E8 47 5F 06 00 89 3C 24 E8 86 58 06 00 83 C4 10
56 89 C3 57 8D BD 76 FF FF FF 6A 01 50 E8 23 54
06 00 89 34 24 8D 73 06 E8 DE 52 06 00 8B 03 83
C4 0C 89 85 76 FF FF FF 8B 43 04 6A 06 68 90 37
49 00 57 66 89 85 7A FF FF FF E8 D1 5B 06 00 83
C4 10 85 C0 74 21 52 6A 06 68 98 37 49 00 57 E8
BC 5B 06 00 83 C4 10 89 C2 31 C0 85 D2 0F 85 F2
